# Create

**Static Method**

Allocates and initializes an instance of the audio box class.

## Declaration

```swift
static OSSharedPtr<IOUserAudioBox> Create(IOUserAudioDriver * in_driver, bool in_is_acquirable, OSString * in_box_uid);
```

## Parameters

- **in_driver**: The [doc://com.apple.audiodriverkit/documentation/AudioDriverKit/IOUserAudioDriver] that owns this object.
- **in_is_acquirable**: A Boolean value that specifies if the box supports being acquired.
- **in_box_uid**: The name of the box, as an [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/DriverKit/OSString].

## Return Value

A poiner to an [doc://com.apple.audiodriverkit/documentation/AudioDriverKit/IOUserAudioBox], if allocation and initialization succeeded.

## Discussion

If you subclass [doc://com.apple.audiodriverkit/documentation/AudioDriverKit/IOUserAudioBox] to override this class’ behavior, don’t use [doc://com.apple.audiodriverkit/documentation/AudioDriverKit/IOUserAudioBox/Create] to allocate and initialize the custom subclass.

## Creating an Audio Box

- **init**: Initializes an instance of the audio box class.
- **IOUserAudioDriver**: A DriverKit provider object that manages communications with an audio device.
